title: Sell Contract (response)
description: A message with transaction results is received

balance_after.description: New account balance after completion of the sale

contract_id.description: Internal contract identifier for the sold contract

reference_id.description: Internal transaction identifier for the corresponding buy transaction

transaction_id.description: Internal transaction identifier for the sale transaction

msg_type.description: Action name of the request made.

req_id.description: Optional field sent in request to map to response, present only when request contains req_id.
